content.query:
USE adv_raw
GO

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS bronze.vw_sales
GO

CREATE VIEW bronze.vw_sales
AS
SELECT SalesOrderLineKey as pos_transaction_id
     , ProductKey as product_id
	 , UnitPrice as item_price
	 , OrderQuantity as item_qty
	 , ProductStandardCost as item_cost
	 , SalesAmount as total_sales_amt
	 , TotalProductCost as total_cost_amt
     , UnitPriceDiscountPct as item_price_disc
     , ExtendedAmount as extended_amt
     , SalesTerritoryKey as sales_territory_id
     , OrderDateKey as order_dt
     , CustomerKey as customer_id
     , ResellerKey as reseller_id
   	 , ShipDateKey as transaction_dt
	 , DueDateKey as batch_dt
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'Sales/Sales.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'adw_sources',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) 
    WITH (
        SalesAmount	decimal(8,2) 1,
        TotalProductCost	decimal(8,2) 2,
        ProductStandardCost	decimal(8,2) 3,
        UnitPriceDiscountPct	decimal(8,2) 4,
        ExtendedAmount	decimal(8,2) 5,
        UnitPrice	decimal(8,2) 6,
        OrderQuantity	integer 7,
        SalesTerritoryKey	integer 8,
        ShipDateKey	integer 9,
        DueDateKey	integer 10,
        OrderDateKey	integer 11,
        ProductKey	integer 12,
        CustomerKey	integer 13,
        ResellerKey	integer 14,
        SalesOrderLineKey	integer 15
    )
    AS r
